title: Dialectical Thinking Exercises
introText: Dialectical thinking helps us move beyond black-and-white perspectives to embrace the complexity of life. These exercises will help you practice holding multiple truths simultaneously.

exercises.title: Dialectical Reframing
exercises.description: Transform either/or thinking into both/and wisdom.

exercises.title: Exploring Perspectives
exercises.description: Practice seeing multiple viewpoints and self-debate.

conclusion.title: Embrace Complexity
conclusion.content: Dialectical thinking isn't about being indecisiveâ€”it's about recognizing that opposing truths can coexist. Practice these skills regularly to develop more flexible and wise thinking patterns.
